reference.shortdesc:
The postreq element contains post-requisites. Post-requisites are steps or tasks that the users need to perform after completing the current task.Suggest "The postreq element contains post-requisitesâ€”steps or tasks that the users need to perform after completing the current task."

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Implementations might want to consider having their stylesheets render a label for this section.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The postreq element is specialized from section. It is defined in the task module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how a user might be directed to notify a test proctor after completing a test.
example.codeblock: <steps> <!-- ... --> <step> <cmd>Click <uicontrol>Done</uicontrol> to complete the test.</cmd> </step> </steps> <postreq>Notify the proctor upon completing this self-test.</postreq>
